title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Whether or not you build your own lesson plans or use previously prepared ones, we have both right here. You will find our educators guide, "And It Is Still That Way" here as well as lesson plans from our virtual museum project. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips During the school year, why not get out of the classroom and enjoy sometime here at Nez Perce National Historical Park? We host a variety of programs during the school year. All Field Trips
